snippet.title: Wolfstride - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
As showcased during Day 2 of Guerrilla Collective 2021, watch this slick gameplay trailer, featuring giant mechs duking it out, for Wolfstride. 

In Wolfstride, an exiled ex-Yakuza, a rookie combat pilot, and a grizzled mechanic team up to compete in the Ultimate Mech Tournament. Use skills and weapons to defeat other mechs in turn-based tactical combat. 

Wolfstride is coming to Steam.

#SummerofGaming
